title: Random moments of not being able to do anything PLEASE HELP
body:
So in my past 3 ranked games I've had random moments of not being able to move or do anything. Note I had steady ping ~80 (not great but definitely not something caused by lag) so its not that. It hasn't effected me too bad but i have caught out when i should have been fine. I have no idea what to do to fix it.

 Things I've tried : restarting router & computer. 

Give me suggestions please, anything.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
It sounds like you could have an unstable connection reaching the game servers, and suffering from packet loss.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview and know for sure.

Should my suspicions confirm packet loss, I suggest then going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network to the game servers.  That should do the trick!
